'''Zuhira''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|An aumaua woman whirls toward you, her eyes wide and wild. Her uniform is disheveled as if from several days' wear, and her breath comes in rapid gasps

With her are a few wounded soldiers and a huddle of commoners in dirt-stained farmers' smocks.}}

Zuhira is the assistant quartermaster of Hasongo, and one of the only survivors of Eothas' attack and the subsequent assault of the naga on what remained of their fort. She survived because she was sent below the fort together with the rest of less-capable Rauataian personnel. The experience left her shaken to the core.

## Interactions

|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Distant Light](/aDistantLight/): She provides information on how to navigate the fort.

Zuhira is the assistant quartermaster of Hasongo, and one of the only survivors of Eothas' attack and the subsequent assault of the naga on what remained of their fort.
